titleStmt.title: An expostulation with the bishops, so called, in England concerning their jurisdiction over the people of God, called Quakers : with a few wholesom words of exhortation and advice, tending to unite them and us in one true spiritual worship.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, John, 1630-1696.

titleStmt.title: An expostulation with the bishops, so called, in England concerning their jurisdiction over the people of God, called Quakers : with a few wholesom words of exhortation and advice, tending to unite them and us in one true spiritual worship.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, John, 1630-1696.
Mason, Martin, fl. 1650-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
Signed at end of Postscript: J.W.
Another edition, Wing W1975A, has title: An expostulation with the bishops in England; signatures at end read: John Whitehead. Martin Mason.
